biotools.summary:
A Shiny application to visualize trait data in the phenotypic space of the global spectrum of plant form and function.

PhenoSpace is a Shiny application – built using the Shiny R package – that helps users to manipulate and visualize data pertaining to the global spectrum of plant form and function.

bioschemas.name: PhenoSpace
